title: England team to face France: Our experts pick their XVs for final Rugby World Cup 2019 group game
text:
England maintained their 100 per cent Rugby World Cup 2019 record with victory over Argentina on Saturday, securing their quarter-final place.

That gives Eddie Jones a little more freedom on who he will select in this weekend's final group stage match against France.

Jones is, however, awaiting news on Billy Vunipola's injured ankle after being forced off at half-time during the 39-10 win.

"We will have a clearer picture tomorrow (Tuesday). He's having a scan as a precaution," England scrum coach Neal Hatley told a news conference on Monday.

"He's walking around with a smile on his face -- but it's nearly lunchtime so he's happy."
description: England maintained their 100 per cent Rugby World Cup 2019 record with victory over Argentina on Saturday, securing their quarter-final place.
